response.overview: Gerasimos is a typical example of a family man, living under the oppressive care of his wife, who literally does not let him do anything. But one day another woman enters his life, but unfortunately for him they have a car accident. In order not to be exposed, Gerasimos pretends to have amnesia and thus finds an opportunity to change his life. He throws it out, takes initiative and generally does pretty much the opposite of what he did before. However, this arouses the suspicions of his wife. She, smarter, cuts him off and squeezes him into the housework, which he supposedly did before, making his life unlivable...
response.title: Grippi... agapi mou
